text: (eyaṭa mūsāgē janatāva ohuṭa) “oba apa veta pæmiṇīmaṭa perada, apiva hiṁsā piḍā karanu læbuvemu. oba pæmiṇi pasuvada (hiṁsā pīḍā karanu labaminma siṭinnemu. obagē pæmiṇīmen apaṭa kisima prayōjanayak æti vūyē næta)” yayi pævasūha. (eyaṭa mūsā) “obagē deviyan obagē saturanva vināśa kara damā, (ovungē) bhūmiyaṭa obava adhipatiyan bavaṭa pat kaḷa hækiya; (eyada) oba kesē hæsirennēdæyi yanna avadhānaya kara bælīma san̆dahā” yayi pævasuvēya
